recipe_name: Fig and Honey Jam with Walnuts
ingredients: 4 cups Mission figs, stemmed, 2 cups honey, 1 cup water,   +   1/4 cup butter, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon grated fresh ginger , 1 cup chopped walnuts
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 3mg 1%, Sodium 56mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 10mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 53mg 1%
